name: blamable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
deserving blame for your actions or for causing a mistake, accident, etc.: You must agree that I am in no way blamable for what happened. If you had confessed immediately, your error would not be so blameable. Synonym
be to blame
More examplesFewer examplesShe had undeniably behaved in a blamable manner.He had been blameable in allowing the man to remain in his post when he was clearly unsuitable. It is true that such carelessness appears very blamable. No one person is entirely blamable for the incident.
